blogPost.title: How do you focus on finishing your projects?
blogPost.description: I've been trying to get back into most of my side-projects, but always find the initial enthusiasm...
blogPost.body_html:
I've been trying to get back into most of my side-projects, but always find the initial enthusiasm die out pretty quickly.

How do you fight this and keep at a single project over time?
blogPost.body_markdown:
I've been trying to get back into most of my side-projects, but always find the initial enthusiasm die out pretty quickly. 

How do you fight this and keep at a single project over time?
